overview:
GU10 Led Bulbs

Buy GU10 LED bulbs with affordable price at Energy Bulbs. Choose huge range of GU10 LED bulbs and energy saving light bulbs and more at Energy Bulbs.

Company Overview

Energy Bulbs is here to help you reduce your energy bills and carbon dioxide emissions, a major cause of climate change. So far, they believe that they have saved the UK public hundreds of thousands of pounds on their electricity bills! And that doesn’t take into account the saving to the environment of all this electricity they have saved their customers through offering premium quality energy saving light bulbs. They are a leading specialist retailer of low energy bulbs, energy saving bulbs, energy efficient bulbs, smilight tubes, GU10 bulbs, low energy GU10 bulbs, Megaman lightbulbs, halogen bulbs, fluorescent tubes and outdoor lighting.

They stock a wide range of energy saving light bulbs from leading manufacturers including Megaman, Osram and Philips. From popular GU10 LED bulbs to decorative candle replacements to ultra low energy LED halogen replacements they have energy saving variations for almost all applications.

Besides domestic bulbs, they also hold energy saving light bulbs for commercial use, to allow businesses to save money on their overheads and maintenance costs and reduce their carbon footprint.

To help their customers choose the right products, their website makes it easy to find availability, pricing and energy ratings. Their focus is on helping customers save money and reduce their carbon footprint, thus helping the environment. This is why they invested in building a website that allows you to quickly and easily find what you’re looking for from their large selection of products. This self service approach ensures they keep their customers satisfied, and their prices competitive.
